statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -5 \\ 1 \\ -7 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 6 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 11 \\ -1 \\ 22 \\ 17 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
